traits.name: Grappler
traits.detail: You have advantage on attack rolls against any target you have grappled. In addition, when grappling a target, any damage you take from an attack is split 50/50 with your victim.

traits.name: (Striker) Press the Attack
traits.detail: You have advantage on attack rolls against bloodied targets (under 50% hit points).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [damage/2, d6] slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. Automatically hits grappled targets. _Hit:_ 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage, plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the vampire heals hit points equal to the necrotic damage.
